content: **yarn** 75g lang yarns paillettes 25g = 112m/122yds held with 150g berroco ultra alpaca light 50g = 133m/146yds **needles needed** size us 9 5 5 mm 32 in /80 cm circular needles or flat needles **other** darning needle + measuring tape **gauge** 19 stitches x 24 row knit in stockinette on size us 9 5 5 mm = 4in x 4in 10cm x 10cm
